data.name:
Impacting Base of the Pyramid
Specialist in Social Startups
data.summary: Bringing together Mentors, Coaches, Investors, Entrepreneurs, Incubators, Government officials, Advisors & Industry Specialists for a short, powerful & solution oriented talk on “Startup Growth in Present Time”. Covering industry specific sectors to give directions to thoughts, concepts, innovation & growth plans that can help startup ideas from particular domains to flourish in uncertain times. Our goal is to help startups and professionals to cope with the current situation and challenges associated with it.
